member.name: M:VstsSyncMigrator.Engine.TestPlandsAndSuitesMigrationContext.RemoveInvalidLinks(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.TestManagement.Client.ITestPlan)
member.remarks: VSTS cannot store some links which have an invalid URI Scheme. You will get errors like "The URL specified has a potentially unsafe URL protocol" For myself, the issue were urls that pointed to TFVC: "vstfs:///VersionControl/Changeset/19415" Unfortunately the API does not seem to allow access to the "raw" data, so there's nowhere to retrieve this as far as I can find. Should take care of https://github.com/nkdAgility/azure-devops-migration-tools/issues/178
member.param: The plan to remove invalid links drom

member.name: T:VstsSyncMigrator.Engine.WorkItemMigrationContext
